original_text: He deserves his punishment and shame. He will never stop being ashamed. He deserves his punishment and shame. He will never stop being ashamed. He deserves his punishment and shame. He will never stop being ashamed.
korean_text: 상함과 능욕을 받고 부끄러움을 씻을 수 없게 되나니

sentences.original_text: He will never stop being ashamed
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 영원히 부끄러움을 멈추지 않을 것이다
